text: A ringleader is a leader of a group of people. Ringleader may also refer to: * Ringmaster (circus), The leader of a circus performance. * Ringleader (comics), a fictional character in the Marvel Universe * Ringleader of the Tormentors, an album by the singer Morrissey * The Ringleader: Mixtape Volume III, an album by the disc jockey DJ Maj * A gang leader ==See also== * Ringmaster (disambiguation)
title: Ringleader
